name: Bold Vase I
description:
ZAR350. South African customers please place orders via email.

A striking Bold Vase made of charcoal stoneware, unglazed on the outside, glazed on the inside.

Approximate size is 12cm (4,7inch) tall by 9cm (3,5inch) at its widest, with a 7cm (2,8inch) wide mouth.

"Strong lines and curves meet to sculpt elegant African shapes and ceremoniously functional art forms".  Read more on the Collections page.

All Klomp Ceramics are made and glazed by hand. Each piece is one-of-a-kind.

name: Geometric Platter I
description:
ZAR450. South African customers please place orders via email.

An extra-ordinary Geometric Platter made of glazed porcelain with gold lustre detailing.

Approximate size is 30cm (11,8inch) long by 13cm (5,1inch) wide and 5mm (0,2inch) thick.

"I love entertaining in an exceptional way. These Geometric Platters, bold in both decoration and shape offer something extraordinary to the art of serving".  Read more on the Collections page.

All Klomp Ceramics are made and glazed by hand. Each piece is one-of-a-kind.

name: S&P Dishes I
description:
ZAR130. South African customers please place orders via email.

A pair of Salt & Pepper Dishes made of glazed porcelain with gold lustre detailing.

Approximate sizes are 1,5cm (0,6inch) tall by 6,5m (2,5inch) diameter for the one bowl, and 2cm (0,8inch) tall by 9cm (3,5inch) diameter for the other bowl. 

"I have a little thing for serving salt and pepper as stylishly as I possibly can. This special pair of S&P Dishes offer a certain celebratory elegance to any dining table". Read more on the Collections page.

All Klomp Ceramics are made and glazed by hand. Each piece is uniquely one-of-a-kind.

(Also great as dipping bowls for balsamic vinegar, olive oil or condiments).

name: Pattern Plates I
description:
ZAR420. South African customers please place orders via email.

A unique set of Pattern Plates made of glazed porcelain.

Approximate sizes are 3cm (1,2inch) high by 11,5cm (4,5inch) diameter for the bowl and 1,5cm (0,6inch) high by 17cm (6,7inch) diameter for the plate.

"I can never have or use or love enough plates & bowls, especially interesting ones in a range of sizes. Make merry serving with, arranging on, or eating off this collection of beautiful Pattern Plates". Read more on the Collections page. 

All Klomp Ceramics are made and glazed by hand. Each piece is one-of-a-kind.

name: Urban Tribe Neckpiece I
description:
ZAR400 South African customers please place orders via email.

A unique Urban Tribe Neckpiece made of glazed porcelain, using a wax resist technique, on a sterling silver chain.

Approximate size is 10,5cm (4inch) long by 3,5cm (1,4inch) wide on a 42cm (16,5inch) long chain.

"Being part of an urban landscape is being part of a modern day tribe. So don your tribal patterns proudly and let people know who you are and where you belong in a celebration of self".  Read more on the Collections page.

All Klomp Ceramics are made and glazed by hand. Each piece is one-of-a-kind.

(Please note that porcelain is strong and these neckpieces are very durable).

name: Midnight Bowl I
description:
ZAR300. South African customers please place orders via email.

A single precious Midnight Bowl made of charcoal stoneware, unglazed on the outside, glazed on the inside with gold lustre detailing.

Approximate size is 5cm (2inch) tall by 10,5cm (4inch) diameter.

"When I was a little girl I imagined the night sky to be a beautiful bowl turned upside down on the world. These decorative Midnight Bowls in a variety of sculptural shapes and sizes commemorates those memories of magical night skies". Read more on the Collections page. 

All Klomp Ceramics are made and glazed by hand. Each piece is one-of-a-kind.
